duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement HR policies, programs, and initiatives to support the overall strategic objectives of the company.
Manage the full cycle recruitment process and assist in talent acquisition, succession planning, and retention initiatives.
Maintain compliance with federal and state employment laws and regulations.
Assist in the creation and improvement of new processes and policies.
Provide coaching to mitigate employee performance and issues, and participate in employee disciplinary meetings, terminations, and exit interviews.
Oversee the payroll process and administer company benefit plans.
Foster a safe and healthy work environment, ensuring consistent high levels of communication are kept among management and employees.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or college diploma in HR related field combined with a minimum of 3 years’ experience. CHRL or CHRP designation preferred.
